dict.acceptation: 倾向，趋势；（话或作品等的）旨趣，意向；性情；癖好；

sent.orig: Objective To evaluate the application of tendency-oriented perimetry (TOP) in detecting the visual function of glaucoma.
sent.trans: 目的评价趋势导向视野检查法(tendency-orientedperimetry,TOP)在青光眼视功能检测中的应用价值。

sent.orig: Instead of a tendency towards equilibrium, financial markets have a tendency to develop bubbles.
sent.trans: 金融市场不具有趋于均衡的倾向，反而有生成泡沫的倾向。

sent.orig: Methods: The tendency straightline forecast method & the tendency season mould forecast method.
sent.trans: 方法：用趋势直线预测法和趋势季节模型预测法。

sent.orig: The tendency to substitution may be overborne by a contrary tendency.
sent.trans: 替代的趋势也许会被一种相反的趋势所压倒。

sent.orig: China exports Japan's situation with this similarly, and slides the tendency possibly to continue.
sent.trans: 中国出口日本的情形与此类似，且下滑趋势可能延续。
